fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, break into somebody’s home and take their valuables

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you take valuables from a player with a limited use ability, you take one of their uses and are able to use it for yourself the next night. If their ability is infinite, you take their tools, granting you a one use charge of one of their abilities and they’re unable to use that ability the following night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Take down the Town through various crimes.
